title: How to Log Out on Spotify on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Tap to open the Spotify app.
steps.content: Tap to open the Spotify app. It is a black icon with a circular green speaker shape.

steps.title: Navigate to the ‘Home’ at the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Navigate to the ‘Home’ at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap the icon that looks like a gear in the top right corner of the page.
steps.content: Tap the icon that looks like a gear in the top right corner of the page. This will open up the Settings menu

steps.title: Scroll to the bottom of the settings menu, and tap the ‘Log Out’ button.
steps.content: Scroll to the bottom of the settings menu, and tap the ‘Log Out’ button.

steps.title: Tap ‘Log Out’ on the ‘Are you sure you want to log out’ prompt.
steps.content: Tap ‘Log Out’ on the ‘Are you sure you want to log out’ prompt.

steps.title: Open your mobile web browser of choice (Chrome, Safari, etc).
steps.content: Open your mobile web browser of choice (Chrome, Safari, etc).

steps.title: Navigate to www.spotify.com.
steps.content: Navigate to www.spotify.com . Note that you can not log out of Spotify on all devices from within the Spotify app, it must be done from the Spotify web page.

steps.title: Log in using the ‘Log In’ link in the top right corner of the page.
steps.content: Log in using the ‘Log In’ link in the top right corner of the page.

steps.title: Tap the Menu icon in the top right corner of the Spotify web page.
steps.content: Tap the Menu icon in the top right corner of the Spotify web page. The Menu icon looks like three horizontal white lines.

steps.title: Tap the ‘Account’ option.
steps.content: Tap the ‘Account’ option. This will take you to your Account Overview page.

steps.title: Scroll down to the section labeled ‘Sign out everywhere’.
steps.content: Scroll down to the section labeled ‘Sign out everywhere’.

steps.title: Tap the ‘Sign Out Everywhere’ button.
steps.content: Tap the ‘Sign Out Everywhere’ button. This will sign out all of the devices currently logged into your Spotify account.
